events.name: WOWZAPP 2012: Worldwide Hackathon for Windows -- Thurles, Ireland
events.about:
Be part of the app revolution!

By registering, you’ll be joining thousands of developers worldwide as we build apps for the next generation of Windows.

Expert Help, Free Resources

Microsoft app experts, developers and trainers will be available on-site to assist your learning and coding. Learn about building Windows Store apps today – download the info, tools and resources you need now. 

Windows Azure Mobile Services

Does your Store app idea include cloud services or storage? Check out Get started with Mobile Services –registered student WOWZAPP 2012 participants are eligible for a FREE student Windows Azure six-month subscription! – supplies are limited so be sure to register now!

Before you register

By registering, you are agreeing to the following terms and conditions prior to participating at WOWZAPP Thurles site.

  • You must be a full-time 3rd level student and over 18.
  • You must have permission from a college/university mentor.
  • You will also need to sign a participation agreement, prior to taking part.
  • Some food such as breakfast cereal and snacks will be provided, we ask that if youhave special dietry requirments that you please bring food requirements with you.
  • You need to register to be offered a seat, registration is not a guarantee of participation, you must receive a seat offer.
